name: search_all_cars
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool all_cars_names_image_and_variants_info.
Tool description: Search All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info with this api ,search once and get list of all cars. use it for auto-suggestion
API description: This API will fetch you all cars list, 
If you need bike details change **vehicle_type** from "car" to "bike".

vehicle_type.description: Type of vehicle to fetch details for (e.g., 'car' or 'bike').
